content.text: is designed to retrieve extended billing information for accounts associated with a specific agency code. It processes billing data for different energy sources (electric, gas, steam) and returns detailed billing adjustments and consumption data. The procedure logs its usage, determines whether to fetch data by agency or facility, and uses multiple UNION ALL queries to compile results from various billing adjustment tables.
The complexity level of this stored procedure is high due to the following reasons:
It involves multiple conditional logic paths based on input parameters.
It uses Common Table Expressions (CTEs) and table variables.
It performs multiple UNION ALL operations to combine results from different billing adjustment sources.
It involves complex joins and filtering logic across several tables.
: The email address of the user requesting the report, used for logging purposes.
: The billing period for which the data is being requested.
: The code representing the agency for which billing information is required.
: The facility number used to determine if data should be fetched by agency or facility.
: The procedure logs its execution details using the
: It checks if the facility number corresponds to a valid sequence ID. If not, it sets a flag to fetch data by agency.
: It populates a table variable with agency division sequence IDs, including descendants, using a user-defined function.
: Uses a CTE to aggregate electric billing adjustments and consumption data, then selects detailed billing information.
: Retrieves gas billing adjustments and consumption data, filtering by energy source.
: Similar to gas data but from a different adjustment table.
: Retrieves manual billing adjustments for electric and gas, using different logic for each energy source.
: Combines results from all data retrieval blocks using UNION ALL.
, which can improve performance by avoiding locks but leads to dirty reads.
: The use of multiple joins and aggregations can be resource-intensive, especially with large datasets.
: Combining multiple result sets can increase execution time and memory usage.
: While useful for organizing logic, they can impact performance if not optimized, especially with large intermediate result sets.
can lead to reading uncommitted or inconsistent data.
: The complexity and number of joins may not scale well with large datasets or high concurrency.
: The procedure lacks explicit error handling, which could lead to unhandled exceptions or incomplete transactions.
: The procedure relies on a user-defined function for agency hierarchy, which could introduce dependencies or performance bottlenecks if not optimized.
: The procedure contains hardcoded logic for energy sources, which may require updates if business rules change.

CREATE PROCEDURE [Report].[usp_Published_GetAccountExtentedBillingInformationByAgencyCode]
(
	@EmailAddress AS VARCHAR(75),
	@PublishedBillingPeriod AS VARCHAR(6),
	@AgencyCode AS VARCHAR(6),
	@OECFacilityNumber AS VARCHAR(7)
)
AS
BEGIN
	SET NOCOUNT ON;
	SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;

	DECLARE @spname VARCHAR(100) = OBJECT_NAME(@@PROCID);

	EXEC [Audit].usp_AddReportUsageLog
		@ReportName					= @spname,
		@StoredProcName				= @spname,
		@RequestedBy				= @EmailAddress,
		@prmPublishedBillingPeriod	= @PublishedBillingPeriod,
		@prmBillingPeriod			= NULL,
		@prmAgency_ies				= @AgencyCode,
		@prmFacilityNumber_s		= @OECFacilityNumber,
		@prmStartingBillingPeriod	= NULL,
		@prmEndingBillingPeriod		= NULL;
	
	DECLARE @FacilitySeqid AS INT, @ResultByAgency AS CHAR(1);
		
	-- convert the facility number to seqid
	SELECT @FacilitySeqid = FacilitySeqid FROM Billing.Facility WHERE OecFacilityNumber = @OECFacilityNumber;	
	
	-- determine if we need to return data by agency or simply for the single facility
	IF (@FacilitySeqid IS NULL)
	BEGIN
		SET @ResultByAgency = 'Y';
	END;
	ELSE
	BEGIN
		SET @ResultByAgency = 'N';
	END;
			
	-- collect the agencies into a table variable to save a bit
	DECLARE @AgencyAndItsDecendants TABLE(AgencyDivisionSeqID INT);

	-- populate the table
	INSERT INTO @AgencyAndItsDecendants (AgencyDivisionSeqID)
	SELECT AgencyDivisionSeqID 
	FROM Billing.uftn_TableGetAllAgencyChildrenByAgencyCodeOEC(@AgencyCode, @EmailAddress);

	-- return a view of the AccountBillingAdjutmentElectric data
	
	-- the Electric Block	
		
	-- Define the CTE expression name and column list.
	WITH ABAE_TOD_Usage_CTE (ABAESeqid, BillingPeriod, BillingPeriodRevision,ConsumtionOnPeak ,ConsumtionOffPeak, CancelConsumtionOnPeak, CancelConsumtionOffPeak)
	AS(SELECT ABAE.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectricSeqid AS ABAESeqid
			,ABAE.BillingPeriod
			,ABAE.BillingPeriodRevision
			,SUM(MBAE.Consumption) AS ConsumtionOnPeak
			,SUM(MBAE.ConsumptionHoursOffPeak) AS ConsumtionOffPeak
			,SUM(MBAE.CancelConsumption) AS CancelConsumtionOnPeak
			,SUM(MBAE.CancelConsumptionHoursOffPeak) AS CancelConsumtionOffPeak
		FROM Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric ABAE 
			INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS A ON ABAE.AdjustedAccount = A.AccountSeqid 
			INNER JOIN Billing.AccountExchangeMeterTrack AS AEMT ON A.AccountSeqid = AEMT.OriginalAccountSeqid 
			INNER JOIN Billing.Meter AS M ON AEMT.OriginalMeterSeqid = M.MeterSeqid 
			INNER JOIN Billing.MeterBillingAdjustmentElectric AS MBAE ON M.MeterSeqid = MBAE.MeterBilled
				AND ABAE.BillingPeriod = MBAE.BillingPeriod AND ABAE.BillingPeriodRevision = MBAE.BillingPeriodRevision
		WHERE ABAE.IsTimeOfDayAccount = 'Y' AND MBAE.BillingPeriod = @PublishedBillingPeriod
			AND (@ResultByAgency <> 'Y' OR A.AgencyAccount IN (SELECT AgencyDivisionSeqID FROM @AgencyAndItsDecendants))
			AND (@ResultByAgency <> 'N' OR A.FacilityAccount = @FacilitySeqid)
		GROUP BY ABAE.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectricSeqid, ABAE.BillingPeriod, ABAE.BillingPeriodRevision)
		
	SELECT CurrentAccount.AccountSeqid
		,CurrentAccount.CurrentAccountNumber
		,A.EnergySource
		,ABAE.BillingPeriod
		,ABAE.BillingPeriodRevision
		,alrdfcp.OriginalBilledAmount
		,alrdfcp.PaidAdjustmentAmount
		,alrdfcp.TotalAmountDue
		,CASE WHEN CTE.ABAESeqid IS NULL THEN ABAE.AccountEnergyUsage ELSE CTE.ConsumtionOnPeak END AS AccountOnPeakKWH 
		,CASE WHEN CTE.ABAESeqid IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE CTE.ConsumtionOffPeak END AS AccountOffPeakKWH
		,ABAE.AccountDemandUsage AS AccountDemandKW
		,ABAE.AccountReactivePowerEnergy AS AccountReactivePowerEnergy
		,ABAE.CommodityConsumption + ABAE.CommodityConsumptionOffPeak + ABAE.CommodityConsumptionShoulder AS ProductionEnergyCharge
		,ABAE.CommodityDemand + ABAE.CommodityDemandOffPeak + ABAE.CommodityDemandShoulder + ABAE.MinimumBilledDemandDollars AS ProductionDemandCharge
		,ABAE.EnergyCostAdjustment AS ProductionECACharges
		,ABAE.DeliveryChargeAmount 
		,ABAE.DeliveryConsumption
		,ABAE.DeliveryDemand + ABAE.DeliveryMinimumBilledAmount AS DeliveryDemandCharge
		,ABAE.CustomerLevelAdjustmentAmount AS AllocatedCityWideElectricCharge
		,ABAE.CommodityAllocationCharge + ABAE.DeliveryAllocationCharge AS FixedCharges
		,ABAE.GrossReceiptTax
		,ABAE.RevisedReactivePowerDollars 
		,ABAE.MinimumBilledDemandUsage
		,ABAE.DeliveryMinimumBilledDemand
		,ABAE.ProductionMisc1 AS ZECsCharge
		--Cancel Block
		,ABAE.ProductionMisc1 AS OriginalZECsCharge
		,CASE WHEN CTE.ABAESeqid IS NULL THEN (-1) * ABAE.CancelAccountEnergyUsage ELSE (-1) * CTE.CancelConsumtionOnPeak END AS OriginalAccountOnPeakKHW 
		,CASE WHEN CTE.ABAESeqid IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE (-1) * CTE.CancelConsumtionOffPeak END AS OriginalAccountOffPeakKWH
		,(-1) * ABAE.CancelAccountDemandUsage AS OriginalAccountDemandKW
		,(-1) * ABAE.CanceledAccountReactivePowerEnergy AS OriginalAccountReactivePowerEnergy  
		,(-1) * ABAE.CancelCommodityConsumption + (-1) * ABAE.CancelCommodityConsumptionOffPeak + (-1) * ABAE.CancelCommodityConsumptionShoulder AS OriginalProductionEnergyCharge
		,(-1) * ABAE.CancelCommodityDemand + (-1) * ABAE.CancelCommodityDemandOffPeak + (-1) * ABAE.cancelCommodityDemandShoulder + (-1) * ABAE.CancelMinimumBilledDemandDollars AS OriginalProductionDemandCharge
		,(-1) * ABAE.CancelEnergyCostAdjustment AS OriginalProductionECACharges
		,(-1) * ABAE.CancelDeliveryChargeAmount AS OriginalDeliveryChargeAmount
		,(-1) * ABAE.CancelDeliveryConsumption AS OriginalDeliveryConsumption
		,(-1) * ABAE.CancelDeliveryDemand + (1) * ABAE.CancelDeliveryMinimumBilledAmount AS OriginalDeliveryDemandCharge
		,ABAE.CustomerLevelAdjustmentAmount AS OriginalAllocatedCityWideElectricCharge
		,ABAE.CommodityAllocationCharge + ABAE.DeliveryAllocationCharge AS OriginalFixedCharges
		,(-1) * ABAE.CancelGrossReceiptTax AS OriginalGrossReceiptTax
		,(-1) * ABAE.OriginalReactivePowerDollars AS OriginalReactivePowerDollars 
		-- steam block here
		,NULL AS RevisedMLBS
		,NULL AS OriginalMLBS
		-- gas starts here
		,NULL AS RevisedCCF
		,NULL AS OriginalCCF
		,NULL AS RevisedTherms
		,NULL AS OriginalTherms						
	FROM Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric AS ABAE
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS A ON ABAE.AdjustedAccount = A.AccountSeqid
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS CurrentAccount ON A.CurrentAccountNumber = CurrentAccount.CurrentAccountNumber 
		INNER JOIN Published.TemporalAccountLevelRawDataForCurrentPeriod AS alrdfcp ON alrdfcp.AccountSeqid = CurrentAccount.AccountSeqid
		LEFT JOIN ABAE_TOD_Usage_CTE AS CTE ON ABAE.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectricSeqid = CTE.ABAESeqid
	WHERE (@ResultByAgency <> 'Y' OR CurrentAccount.AgencyAccount IN (SELECT AgencyDivisionSeqID FROM @AgencyAndItsDecendants))
		AND (@ResultByAgency <> 'N' OR CurrentAccount.FacilityAccount = @FacilitySeqid)
		AND ABAE.BillingPeriod = @PublishedBillingPeriod  
		AND CurrentAccount.CurrentAccountNumber = CurrentAccount.OriginalAccountNumber	-- filters just the current accounts 
		AND  (alrdfcp.EffectiveStartPeriod <= @PublishedBillingPeriod AND alrdfcp.EffectiveEndPeriod > @PublishedBillingPeriod)
		AND ABAE.BillingPeriodRevision = alrdfcp.BillingPeriod
	UNION ALL
	-- the GAS block
	SELECT  
		CurrentAccount.AccountSeqid
		,CurrentAccount.CurrentAccountNumber
		,A.EnergySource
		,ABAG.BillingPeriod
		,ABAG.BillingPeriodRevision
		,alrdfcp.OriginalBilledAmount
		,alrdfcp.PaidAdjustmentAmount
		,alrdfcp.TotalAmountDue
		--electric Block
		,NULL AS AccountOnPeakKWH 
		,NULL AS AccountOffPeakKWH
		,NULL AS AccountDemandKW
		,NULL AS AccountReactivePowerEnergy
		,alrdfcp.RevisedBilledAmount AS ProductionEnergyCharge
		,NULL AS ProductionDemandCharge
		,NULL AS ProductionECACharges
		,NULL AS DeliveryChargeAmount 
		,NULL AS DeliveryConsumption
		,NULL AS DeliveryDemandCharge
		,NULL AS AllocatedCityWideElectricCharge
		,NULL AS FixedCharges
		,NULL AS GrossReceiptTax
		,NULL AS RevisedReactivePowerDollars
		,NULL AS MinimumBilledDemandUsage
		,NULL AS DeliveryMinimumBilledDemand 
		,NULL AS ZECsCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalZECsCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountOnPeakKHW
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountOffPeakKWH
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountDemandKW
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountReactivePowerEnergy  
		,alrdfcp.OriginalBilledAmount AS OriginalProductionEnergyCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalProductionDemandCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalProductionECACharges
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryChargeAmount
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryConsumption
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryDemandCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalAllocatedCityWideElectricCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalFixedCharges
		,NULL AS OriginalGrossReceiptTax
		,NULL AS OriginalReactivePowerDollars 
		-- steam block here
		,NULL AS RevisedMLBS
		,NULL AS OriginalMLBS
		-- gas starts here
		,RevisedCCF AS RevisedCCF
		,ABAG.CanceledCCF AS OriginalCCF
		,RevisedTherms AS RevisedTherms
		,ABAG.CanceledTherms AS OriginalTherms
	FROM Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentGas AS ABAG
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS A ON ABAG.AccountSeqid = A.AccountSeqid
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS CurrentAccount ON A.CurrentAccountNumber = CurrentAccount.CurrentAccountNumber 
		INNER JOIN Published.TemporalAccountLevelRawDataForCurrentPeriod AS alrdfcp ON alrdfcp.AccountSeqid = CurrentAccount.AccountSeqid
	WHERE (@ResultByAgency <> 'Y' OR CurrentAccount.AgencyAccount IN (SELECT AgencyDivisionSeqID FROM @AgencyAndItsDecendants))
		AND (@ResultByAgency <> 'N' OR CurrentAccount.FacilityAccount = @FacilitySeqid)
		AND ABAG.BillingPeriod = @PublishedBillingPeriod  
		AND CurrentAccount.CurrentAccountNumber = CurrentAccount.OriginalAccountNumber	-- filters just the current accounts 
		AND (alrdfcp.EffectiveStartPeriod <= @PublishedBillingPeriod AND alrdfcp.EffectiveEndPeriod > @PublishedBillingPeriod)
		AND ABAG.BillingPeriodRevision = alrdfcp.BillingPeriod
		AND A.EnergySource = 5
	UNION ALL
	-- the CRIS GAS block
	SELECT CurrentAccount.AccountSeqid
		,CurrentAccount.CurrentAccountNumber
		,A.EnergySource
		,ABACG.BillingPeriod
		,ABACG.BillingPeriodRevision
		,talrdfcp.OriginalBilledAmount
		,talrdfcp.PaidAdjustmentAmount
		,talrdfcp.TotalAmountDue
		--electric Block
		,NULL AS AccountOnPeakKWH 
		,NULL AS AccountOffPeakKWH
		,NULL AS AccountDemandKW
		,NULL AS AccountReactivePowerEnergy
		,talrdfcp.RevisedBilledAmount AS ProductionEnergyCharge
		,NULL AS ProductionDemandCharge
		,NULL AS ProductionECACharges
		,NULL AS DeliveryChargeAmount 
		,NULL AS DeliveryConsumption
		,NULL AS DeliveryDemandCharge
		,NULL AS AllocatedCityWideElectricCharge
		,NULL AS FixedCharges
		,NULL AS GrossReceiptTax
		,NULL AS RevisedReactivePowerDollars
		,NULL AS MinimumBilledDemandUsage
		,NULL AS DeliveryMinimumBilledDemand 
		,NULL AS ZECsCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalZECsCharge					
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountOnPeakKHW
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountOffPeakKWH
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountDemandKW
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountReactivePowerEnergy  
		,talrdfcp.OriginalBilledAmount AS OriginalProductionEnergyCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalProductionDemandCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalProductionECACharges
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryChargeAmount
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryConsumption
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryDemandCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalAllocatedCityWideElectricCharge
		,NULL AS OrignalFixedCharges
		,NULL AS OriginalGrossReceiptTax
		,NULL AS OriginalReactivePowerDollars 
		-- steam block here
		,NULL AS RevisedMLBS
		,NULL AS OriginalMLBS
		-- gas starts here
		,RevisedCCF AS RevisedCCF
		,ABACG.CancelCCF AS OriginalCCF
		,RevisedTherms AS RevisedTherms
		,ABACG.CancelTherms AS OriginalTherms
	FROM Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas AS ABACG
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS A ON ABACG.AccountSeqid = A.AccountSeqid
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS CurrentAccount ON A.CurrentAccountNumber = CurrentAccount.CurrentAccountNumber 
		INNER JOIN Published.TemporalAccountLevelRawDataForCurrentPeriod AS talrdfcp ON talrdfcp.AccountSeqid = CurrentAccount.AccountSeqid
	WHERE (@ResultByAgency <> 'Y' OR CurrentAccount.AgencyAccount IN (SELECT AgencyDivisionSeqID FROM @AgencyAndItsDecendants))
		AND (@ResultByAgency <> 'N' OR CurrentAccount.FacilityAccount = @FacilitySeqid)
		AND ABACG.BillingPeriod = @PublishedBillingPeriod   
		AND CurrentAccount.CurrentAccountNumber = CurrentAccount.OriginalAccountNumber	-- filters just the current accounts 
		AND (talrdfcp.EffectiveStartPeriod <= @PublishedBillingPeriod AND talrdfcp.EffectiveEndPeriod > @PublishedBillingPeriod)
		AND ABACG.BillingPeriodRevision = talrdfcp.BillingPeriod
	UNION ALL
	-- the manual billing STEAM block
	SELECT CurrentAccount.AccountSeqid
		,CurrentAccount.CurrentAccountNumber
		,A.EnergySource
		,ABAPB.BillingPeriod
		,ABAPB.BillingPeriodRevision
		,talrdfcp.OriginalBilledAmount
		,talrdfcp.PaidAdjustmentAmount
		,talrdfcp.TotalAmountDue
		--electric Block
		,NULL AS AccountOnPeakKWH 
		,NULL AS AccountOffPeakKWH
		,NULL AS AccountDemandKW
		,NULL AS AccountReactivePowerEnergy
		,talrdfcp.RevisedBilledAmount AS ProductionEnergyCharge
		,NULL AS ProductionDemandCharge
		,NULL AS ProductionECACharges
		,NULL AS DeliveryChargeAmount 
		,NULL AS DeliveryConsumption
		,NULL AS DeliveryDemandCharge
		,NULL AS AllocatedCityWideElectricCharge
		,NULL AS FixedCharges
		,NULL AS GrossReceiptTax
		,NULL AS RevisedReactivePowerDollars 
		,NULL AS MinimumBilledDemandUsage
		,NULL AS DeliveryMinimumBilledDemand
		,NULL AS ZECsCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalZECsCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountOnPeakKHW
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountOffPeakKWH
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountDemandKW
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountReactivePowerEnergy  
		,talrdfcp.OriginalBilledAmount AS OriginalProductionEnergyCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalProductionDemandCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalProductionECACharges
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryChargeAmount
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryConsumption
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryDemandCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalAllocatedCityWideElectricCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalFixedCharges
		,NULL AS OriginalGrossReceiptTax
		,NULL AS OriginalReactivePowerDollars 
		-- steam starts here
		,ABAPB.RevisedEnergy AS RevisedMLBS
		,ABAPB.CanceledEnergy AS OriginalMLBS
		-- gas starts here
		,NULL AS RevisedCCF
		,NULL AS OriginalCCF
		,NULL AS RevisedTherms
		,NULL AS OriginalTherms					
	FROM Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill AS ABAPB
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS A ON ABAPB.AccountSeqid = A.AccountSeqid
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS CurrentAccount ON A.CurrentAccountNumber = CurrentAccount.CurrentAccountNumber 
		INNER JOIN Published.TemporalAccountLevelRawDataForCurrentPeriod AS talrdfcp ON talrdfcp.AccountSeqid = CurrentAccount.AccountSeqid
	WHERE (@ResultByAgency <> 'Y' OR CurrentAccount.AgencyAccount IN (SELECT AgencyDivisionSeqID FROM @AgencyAndItsDecendants))
		AND (@ResultByAgency <> 'N' OR CurrentAccount.FacilityAccount = @FacilitySeqid)
		AND ABAPB.BillingPeriod = @PublishedBillingPeriod  
		AND CurrentAccount.CurrentAccountNumber = CurrentAccount.OriginalAccountNumber	-- filters just the current accounts 
		AND (talrdfcp.EffectiveStartPeriod <= @PublishedBillingPeriod AND talrdfcp.EffectiveEndPeriod > @PublishedBillingPeriod)
		AND ABAPB.BillingPeriodRevision = talrdfcp.BillingPeriod
		AND CurrentAccount.EnergySource = 6
	UNION ALL	
	-- the manual billing ELECTRIC block
	SELECT CurrentAccount.AccountSeqid
		,CurrentAccount.CurrentAccountNumber
		,1 AS EnergySource
		,ABAPB.BillingPeriod
		,ABAPB.BillingPeriodRevision
		,talrdfcp.OriginalBilledAmount
		,talrdfcp.PaidAdjustmentAmount
		,talrdfcp.TotalAmountDue
		--electric Block
		,ABAPB.RevisedEnergy AS AccountOnPeakKWH 
		,NULL AS AccountOffPeakKWH
		,ABAPB.RevisedDemand AS AccountDemandKW
		,NULL AS AccountReactivePowerEnergy
		,talrdfcp.RevisedBilledAmount AS ProductionEnergyCharge
		,NULL AS ProductionDemandCharge
		,NULL AS ProductionECACharges
		,NULL AS DeliveryChargeAmount 
		,NULL AS DeliveryConsumption
		,NULL AS DeliveryDemandCharge
		,NULL AS AllocatedCityWideElectricCharge
		,NULL AS FixedCharges
		,NULL AS GrossReceiptTax
		,NULL AS RevisedReactivePowerDollars 
		,NULL AS MinimumBilledDemandUsage
		,NULL AS DeliveryMinimumBilledDemand
		,NULL AS ZECsCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalZECsCharge
		,ISNULL(ABAPB.CanceledEnergy, 0) AS OriginalAccountOnPeakKHW
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountOffPeakKWH
		,ISNULL(ABAPB.CanceledDemand, 0) AS OriginalAccountDemandKW
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountReactivePowerEnergy  
		,talrdfcp.OriginalBilledAmount AS OriginalProductionEnergyCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalProductionDemandCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalProductionECACharges
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryChargeAmount
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryConsumption
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryDemandCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalAllocatedCityWideElectricCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalFixedCharges
		,NULL AS OriginalGrossReceiptTax
		,NULL AS OriginalReactivePowerDollars 
		-- steam starts here
		,NULL AS RevisedMLBS
		,NULL AS OriginalMLBS
		-- gas starts here
		,NULL AS RevisedCCF
		,NULL AS OriginalCCF
		,NULL AS RevisedTherms
		,NULL AS OriginalTherms
	FROM Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill AS ABAPB
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS A ON ABAPB.AccountSeqid = A.AccountSeqid
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS CurrentAccount ON A.CurrentAccountNumber = CurrentAccount.CurrentAccountNumber 
		INNER JOIN Published.TemporalAccountLevelRawDataForCurrentPeriod AS talrdfcp ON talrdfcp.AccountSeqid = CurrentAccount.AccountSeqid
	WHERE (@ResultByAgency <> 'Y' OR CurrentAccount.AgencyAccount IN (SELECT AgencyDivisionSeqID FROM @AgencyAndItsDecendants))
		AND (@ResultByAgency <> 'N' OR CurrentAccount.FacilityAccount = @FacilitySeqid)
		AND ABAPB.BillingPeriod = @PublishedBillingPeriod  
		AND CurrentAccount.CurrentAccountNumber = CurrentAccount.OriginalAccountNumber	-- filters just the current accounts 
		AND (talrdfcp.EffectiveStartPeriod <= @PublishedBillingPeriod AND talrdfcp.EffectiveEndPeriod > @PublishedBillingPeriod)
		AND ABAPB.BillingPeriodRevision = talrdfcp.BillingPeriod
		AND CurrentAccount.EnergySource IN (1,2,3,4) -- all electric
	UNION ALL
	-- the manual billing GAS block
	SELECT CurrentAccount.AccountSeqid
		,CurrentAccount.CurrentAccountNumber
		,A.EnergySource
		,ABAPB.BillingPeriod
		,ABAPB.BillingPeriodRevision
		,talrdfcp.OriginalBilledAmount
		,talrdfcp.PaidAdjustmentAmount
		,talrdfcp.TotalAmountDue
		--electric Block
		,NULL AS AccountOnPeakKWH 
		,NULL AS AccountOffPeakKWH
		,NULL AS AccountDemandKW
		,NULL AS AccountReactivePowerEnergy
		,talrdfcp.RevisedBilledAmount AS ProductionEnergyCharge
		,NULL AS ProductionDemandCharge
		,NULL AS ProductionECACharges
		,NULL AS DeliveryChargeAmount 
		,NULL AS DeliveryConsumption
		,NULL AS DeliveryDemandCharge
		,NULL AS AllocatedCityWideElectricCharge
		,NULL AS FixedCharges
		,NULL AS GrossReceiptTax
		,NULL AS RevisedReactivePowerDollars 
		,NULL AS MinimumBilledDemandUsage
		,NULL AS DeliveryMinimumBilledDemand
		,NULL AS ZECsCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalZECsCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountOnPeakKHW
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountOffPeakKWH
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountDemandKW
		,NULL AS OriginalAccountReactivePowerEnergy  
		,talrdfcp.OriginalBilledAmount AS OriginalProductionEnergyCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalProductionDemandCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalProductionECACharges
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryChargeAmount
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryConsumption
		,NULL AS OriginalDeliveryDemandCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalAllocatedCityWideElectricCharge
		,NULL AS OriginalFixedCharges
		,NULL AS OriginalGrossReceiptTax
		,NULL AS OriginalReactivePowerDollars 
		-- steam starts here
		,NULL AS RevisedMLBS
		,NULL AS OriginalMLBS
		-- gas starts here
		,ABAPB.RevisedCCF AS RevisedCCF
		,ABAPB.CanceledCCF AS OriginalCCF
		,ABAPB.RevisedEnergy AS RevisedTherms
		,ABAPB.CanceledEnergy AS OriginalTherms
	FROM Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill AS ABAPB
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS A ON ABAPB.AccountSeqid = A.AccountSeqid
		INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS CurrentAccount ON A.CurrentAccountNumber = CurrentAccount.CurrentAccountNumber 
		INNER JOIN Published.TemporalAccountLevelRawDataForCurrentPeriod AS talrdfcp ON talrdfcp.AccountSeqid = CurrentAccount.AccountSeqid
	WHERE (@ResultByAgency <> 'Y' OR CurrentAccount.AgencyAccount IN (SELECT AgencyDivisionSeqID FROM @AgencyAndItsDecendants))
		AND (@ResultByAgency <> 'N' OR CurrentAccount.FacilityAccount = @FacilitySeqid)
		AND ABAPB.BillingPeriod = @PublishedBillingPeriod  
		AND CurrentAccount.CurrentAccountNumber = CurrentAccount.OriginalAccountNumber	-- filters just the current accounts 
		AND (talrdfcp.EffectiveStartPeriod <= @PublishedBillingPeriod AND talrdfcp.EffectiveEndPeriod > @PublishedBillingPeriod)
		AND ABAPB.BillingPeriodRevision = talrdfcp.BillingPeriod
		AND CurrentAccount.EnergySource = 5; -- gas only
END;
